titles.title: A resolution honoring the 100th anniversary of the United States Army Field Artillery School at Fort Sill, Oklahoma.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 5/17/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Honors: (1) the 100th anniversary of the U.S. Army Field Artillery School at Fort Sill, Oklahoma; and (2) the long line of men and women of the Army Field Artillery who have served and continue to serve in the protection of U.S. national security.
